title: Mirror FE
description: MirrorFE (frontend) is a management tool that offers continuous tracking of user activities, creating detailed records that are stored and utilized to provide an overview of progress made over time.

title: Mirror BE
description: MirrorBE (backend) is API server that responds to MirrorFE CRUD & Filtering requests to preform operations on entities from MongoDB database.

title: The Movie DB
description: Powered by The Movie DB API this project effortlessly browses through a comprehensive library using our advanced state management system, featuring intuitive filtering and a robust search bar. Each title has its own dedicated page, offering detailed information and a trailer.
